oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Campaign After Thursday. Mrs. Thomas Peacock Miller, chair- man of the league, stated just before the meeting adjourned that after regis- tering closes Thursday night members of the league and candidates will be at liberty to carry on campaigns for them- selves or anyone else they are inter - ested in. Ward committees of the Non Partisan league will try to invite all candidates to address them at meetings to be held in the near future and every effort will be made to give all candidates equal opportunities to state their reasons for candidacy.
